Hey!

Welcome to my portfolio,

About me.

"During my journey I studied electronic and digital systems, which allowed me to learn more about computer science and how it works.
Later, my love of art and creativity led me to pursue professional training in music.
That's how I decided to combine my passions for digital technologies and creativity to become a Web Developer".

01.

I've always been attracted to designing websites and their interactions. That's why I pay particular attention to animations, performances, and design in my projects.
I like to create new experiences and ensure the perfect pixel layout to create the best possible user experience.
I'm also committed to accessibility and SEO so that my projects are accessible to everyone and for everyone.

02.

I started learning web development on my own for eight months full-time. Then decided to take the Openclassrooms web developer training course for nine months to validate my skills and learn new things. Especially by creating projects that meet the needs of the current market.
I usually work in vanilla javascript, but I'm always curious to learn new things that can improve my knowledge and possibilities in my working environment.

Experiences.

About today

I'm currently looking to join a company that will allow me to put my skills to good use. I would like to participate in the development of new projects while continuing to perfect my skills and contribute to the company's growth.
I also continue to train and work on projects independently every day.

Openclassrooms, 2023

I completed the 9-month web integrator training course with Openclassrooms, which enabled me to carry out 12 projects in line with current business needs. This enabled me to confirm my knowledge and develop my skills. In particular, I was able to work on new concepts, find solutions on my own, learn about frameworks, state management, and API requests.

Self-taught training, 2021

I spent 8 months teaching myself the basics of programming(HTML, CSS, Javascript). In particular, I took several online courses on the Udemy platform. This gave me the desire to pursue a diploma course later on, to deepen my skills.

Electronic and digital systems, 2013

I took a professional baccalaureate in electronic and digital systems with a telecommunications and network option in NÃ®mes in the south of France. This gave me a better understanding of how computers work, and how they communicate between clients and servers across the web.
